ActionPlanTmplItmAssessmentInd.name: ActionPlanTmplItmAssessmentInd
ActionPlanTmplItmAssessmentInd.description: Represents the action plan template items and the assessment indicator definitions associated with them.

ActionPlanTemplateItemId.description: The action plan template item that is associated with the assessment indicator definition.

AssessmentIndDefinitionId.description: The assessment indicator definition that is associated with the action plan template item.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Name of the action plan template item assessment indicator definition.
